page.description: Return the session that the table is opened under.
page.original:
&ltTBL>.SESSIONHANDLE() Syntax Handle_Number as N = &ltTBL>.SESSIONHANDLE() Description The &ltTBL>.SESSIONHANDLE() method returns the handle associated with the table. Example dim tbl as P tbl = table.open("category") ? tbl.sessionhandle() = 1.000000
See Also Table Functions and Methods
